titles.title: There Is Quietness In This House That I Live In

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is quietness in this house that I live in.
There is peace in this house that I live in.
There's much love in this house that I live in.
Only God can create such a house.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is joy for each one who lives here.
There is peace, there is love enough for all.
And we have the love of Jesus in our brother.
God redeemed us through Christ from the fall.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is wisdom in this house that we live in.
There is counsel for each one to keep the way.
And we all flow together in the Body,
In this house that we live in today.
